casebody.data:
2001-3394 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Marcus A. AUGILLARD. No. 2001-K-3394. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re State of Louisiana; — Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. B, No. 415-745; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2001-KA-0218.

Denied.

VICTORY, J., would grant the writ. TRAYLOR, J., would grant the writ.
